name: market for phosphane | phosphane | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/3671/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'phosphane', in the Global geography.;This product is generally considered to be used at the production site.  Therefore, the market does not contain any transport.;phosphane'  is an inorganic substance with a CAS no. : 007803-51-2. It is called 'phosphane' under IUPAC naming and its molecular formula is: H3P. It is gas under normal conditions of temperature and pressure and it has no odour. The substance is modelled as a pure substance. On a consumer level, is used in the following products: fumigants. On industrial sites, the substance is used for the manufacture of products in the following sectors: chemicals and microelectronics.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'phosphane',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  phosphane', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
